content: my favorite hobby is golfing the pattern reminds me of a par 5 hole with a long fairway and a small green it s a simple cable pattern well suited for those new to cabling the german pattern including a chart is ready now the english one will follow soon ** english pattern 1 is ready for pdf download now ** 1 http //strickpraxis files wordpress com/2008/06/par-5-socks-engl11 pdf
